alert.note: Alert for Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Southern Marinette County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 5:15AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Marinette and northern Oconto Counties through 600 AM CDT... At 515 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bear Paw Scout Camp, or 32 miles north of Shawano, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crivitz, Mountain, Wausaukee, Bear Paw Scout Camp, Middle Inlet, Lakewood, Mcallister, Governor Thompson State Park, Loomis and Crooked Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Southern Marinette County
